episodes.title: Interview with Author Janja Lalich
episodes.description:
Join us for a deep dive conversation with Dr. Janja Lalich, Founder and CEO of the Lalich Center on Cults and Coercion, and author of Take Back Your Life: Recovering from Cults and Abusive Relationships (3rd edition). Host Becky Parker (Geist) was the primary narrator for this multi-voiced audiobook, and Janja also recorded a couple segments. Learn more about the topic and the audiobook process in this engaging conversation.



Learn more at https://janjalalich.com and https://lalichcenter.org 



Get the audiobook at AMPlify Audiobooks!  (https://proaudiovoices.com/product/take-back-your-life-recovering-from-cults-and-abusive-relationships-3rd-edition/) 



 



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices (https://megaphone.fm/adchoices)
